Your Organization and Title are optional. They will be displayed with your comments and forum posts.

allWebPages.copy:
Pages

This section can be used to introduce the contents of the subpages and encourage your target audience to explore those pages. If this content gets too long, consider splitting it into two smaller paragraphs.

SUBPAGE 1

Create a short description or engaging message to motivate your audience to take action

SUBPAGE 2

Create a short description or engaging message to motivate your audience to take action

Introduce another idea

This section can be used to offer supporting information or introduce a new idea. It's best to keep it relevant to the contents of the page so it doesn't feel out of place.

allWebTemplates.name: Category Filter
allWebTemplates.source:
<!-- Get Course categories option set values -->
{% fetchxml coursecategories %}
<fetch distinct="true" >
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="displayorder" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="objecttypecode" />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="msdynce_coursecategory" />
    </filter>
    <order attribute="objecttypecode" descending="true" />
    <order attribute="displayorder" />
  </entity>
</fetch>
{% endfetchxml %}

{% if coursecategories.results and coursecategories.results.entities and coursecategories.results.entities.size > 0 %}
{% assign entityCode = coursecategories.results.entities[0].objecttypecode %}
{% endif %}

{% editable snippets 'Filter/Category Filter' type: 'html' %}

{% if request.params['search'] | xml_escape %} {% else %} {% endif %}

allWebTemplates.name: Search Results
Tab Header
Portal Web API Wrapper
allWebTemplates.source:
<script>
(function(webapi, $){
  function safeAjax(ajaxOptions) {
   var deferredAjax = $.Deferred();
 
   shell.getTokenDeferred().done(function (token) {
    // add headers for AJAX
    if (!ajaxOptions.headers) {
     $.extend(ajaxOptions, {
      headers: {
       "__RequestVerificationToken": token
      }
     }); 
    } else {
     ajaxOptions.headers["__RequestVerificationToken"] = token;
    }
    $.ajax(ajaxOptions)
     .done(function(data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
      validateLoginSession(data, textStatus, jqXHR, deferredAjax.resolve);
     }).fail(deferredAjax.reject); //AJAX
   }).fail(function () {
    deferredAjax.rejectWith(this, arguments); // on token failure pass the token AJAX and args
   });
 
   return deferredAjax.promise(); 
  }
  webapi.safeAjax = safeAjax;
 })(window.webapi = window.webapi || {}, jQuery)
</script>

allSiteSettings.name: C1/Home
allSiteSettings.description: C1 home page

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/ProfileRedirectEnabled
allSiteSettings.description: Sets whether or not the portal can redirect the user to the profile page after successful sign-in. By default, it is set to true.

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/MaxCapacityLow
allSiteSettings.value: Max capacity should be higher than 1.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/DenyMinors
allSiteSettings.description: Denies use of the portal to minors. By default, it is set to false.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/LoginTrackingEnabled
allSiteSettings.description: A true or false value. If set to true, the Last Successful Login field on the portal user’s contact will be updated with the date and time when they successfully signed in.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/TermsPublicationDate
allSiteSettings.description: A date/time value in GMT format to represent the effective date of the current published terms and conditions. If the terms agreement is enabled, portal users that have not accepted the terms after this date will be asked to accept them the next time they sign in. If the date is not provided, and the terms agreement is enabled, the terms will be presented every time portal users sign in.

allSiteSettings.name: CustomerSupport/DisplayAllUserActivitiesOnTimeline
allSiteSettings.description: Enabling this setting will show all customer activity on the portal timeline.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress
allSiteSettings.description: The default number of unauthenticated login attempts from an IP address before the IP address is blocked for Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan if the attempts occur within Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan amount of time. Default: 1000

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan
allSiteSettings.description: The amount of time the Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress are to be within before the IP address has to wait Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan. Default: 00:03:00 (3 mins)

allSiteSettings.name: Search/RecordTypeFacetsEntities
allSiteSettings.description: Used to group a set of entities under an entry in the record type facet view.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan
allSiteSettings.description: The amount of time the IP address will have to wait if Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress occur within Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan amount of time. Default: 00:10:00 (10 mins)

allSiteSettings.name: search/filters
allSiteSettings.description:
A collection of search logical name filter options. Defining a value here will add dropdown filter options to site-wide search.

This value should be in the form of name/value pairs, with name and value separated by a colon, and pairs separated by a semicolon. For example: "Forums:adx_communityforum,adx_communityforumthread,adx_communityforumpost;Blogs:adx_blog,adx_blogpost,adx_blogpostcomment".

allSiteSettings.name: KnowledgeManagement/DisplayNotes
allSiteSettings.description: Setting controls whether attachments will be displayed on Knowledge articles

allSiteSettings.name: Search/FacetedView
allSiteSettings.description: Determines if faceted search is used for this portal.

allSiteSettings.name: KnowledgeManagement/NotesFilter
allSiteSettings.description: The Prefix entered here will be used to filter Notes Text, allowing you to control notes exposed on the Portal ex: *WEB*

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/StartDateInFuture
allSiteSettings.value: Start date cannot be in the past

allSiteSettings.name: search/query
allSiteSettings.description: Override query for site search, to apply additional weights and filters. @Query is the query text entered by a user. Lucene query syntax reference: http://lucene.apache.org/core/old_versioned_docs/versions/2_9_1/queryparsersyntax.html

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/EndTimeBeforeStartTime
allSiteSettings.value: End time can't come before the start time.

allSiteSettings.name: MultiLanguage/MaximumDepthToClone
allSiteSettings.description: Site setting that controls the depth of the webpage hierarchy that’s cloned in a newly-added supported language. Web link sets and content snippets are cloned in the newly-added language when webpages are cloned.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/TermsAgreementEnabled
allSiteSettings.description: A true or false value. If set to true, the portal will display the terms and conditions of the site. Users must agree to the terms and conditions before they are considered authenticated and can use the site.

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/EndDateBeforeStartDate
allSiteSettings.value: End date can't come before the start date.

allSiteSettings.name: Footer/OutputCache/Enabled
allSiteSettings.description: Set whether the footer web template is output cached.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/DenyMinorsWithoutParentalConsent
allSiteSettings.description: Denies use of the portal to minors without parental consent. By default, it is set to false.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/LocalLoginDeprecated
allSiteSettings.description: A true or false value. If set to true, the local account will be marked as deprecated. The portal user will be required to migrate to a non-deprecated account.

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/MaxCapacityNumber
allSiteSettings.value: Max capacity must be a whole number.

allSiteSettings.name: Header/OutputCache/Enabled
allSiteSettings.description: Set whether the header web template is output cached.

allSiteSettings.name: MultiLanguage/DisplayLanguageCodeInURL
allSiteSettings.description: Site setting that determines if the language code is included in the portal URL.

allSiteSettings.name: ASP/Course/Form/Validation/Field/DescriptionToLong
allSiteSettings.value: Description can't be longer than 1000 characters.

allSiteSettings.name: Authentication/Registration/AzureADLoginEnabled
allSiteSettings.description: Enables or disables Azure AD as an external identity provider. By default, it is set to true.
